HAWASS Zahi (Ed.), in collaboration with Lyla PINCH BROCK, Egyptology at the Dawn of the Twenty-first Century. Proceedings of the Eighth International Congress of Egyptologists, Cairo, 2000. Volume 1: Archaeology; - Volume 2: History, Religion; - Volume 3: Language, Conservation, Museology.

Cairo - New York, The American University in Cairo Press, 2003, 8°, xvi-581 pp., figg., cartes, plans; - xvi-618 pp., figg., cartes, plans; - xvi-451 pp., figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 977-424-674-8; - 977-424-714-0; - 977-424-715-9. £ ég. 337.50 (les 3 voll.).
